thread.section_title: Sports and Weather Right Now - Idaho Sports Headlines
thread.title: Arkansas State beats Idaho 49-35

title: Arkansas State beats Idaho 49-35
text:
Arkansas State beats Idaho 49-35   Arkansas State beats Idaho 49-35 Posted: Updated: 
JONESBORO, Ark. (AP) - Michael Gordon ran for three touchdowns to lead Arkansas State to a 49-35 win over Idaho in Sun Belt Conference play on Saturday night. 
Gordon carried 26 times for 221 yards for the Red Wolves (2-3, 1-0). Johnston White ran for two touchdowns and James Tabary threw for 188 yards and a score. 
After an Idaho interception return for a score early in the second quarter, Gordon responded with a 59-yard touchdown run to tie it 14-14. The Red Wolves also scored on their next two possessions, on a 2-yard run by White followed by another TD run by Gordon to lift the team to a 28-14 lead at halftime. 
Gordon posted his third touchdown on a 10-yard run midway through the third quarter to stretch the Red Wolves' lead to 35-14. 
Jake Luton had 166 yards for the Vandals (1-4, 0-2) and was intercepted three times. Copyright 2015 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. Rookie forward Jaret Anderson-Dolan picked an opportune time to score the first three goals of his young WHL career, netting a hat trick to lead the Spokane Chiefs to a come-from-behind 6-4 win over the rival Tri-City Americans on Saturday Night at Spokane Arena. Forward Hudson Elynuik earned the distinction of scoring the Chiefs' first goal of the 2015-16 regular season, punching in a rebound opportunity just 1:14 into regulation.
